title: New Treatment Fund: access to new treatments | GOV.WALES
description: The New Treatment Fund speeds up patient access to life-improving and life-saving new treatments.
cleaned_text: The New Treatment Fund speeds up patient access to life-improving and life-saving new treatments. The New Treatment Fund ensures that patients have faster access to medicines recommended by: [the National Institute for Health and Care Excellence (NICE)](https://www.nice.org.uk/) [the All Wales Medicines Strategy Group (AWMSG)](http://www.awmsg.org/healthcare_about.html) The fund enables health boards and trusts to make new medicines available as soon as possible. Once it has been approved, health boards and trusts have a 60-day deadline to make a newly recommended medicine available for prescription. They regularly [ report](https://gov.wales/new-treatment-fund-prescribing-list-annual-reports) how quickly they put the new medicines onto their prescribing lists to Welsh Government.
